source.@value:
rule "suspicious dll names"
when
    has_field("dll_path") &&
    (contains(to_string($message.dll_path), "tabcteng.dll") ||
    contains(to_string($message.dll_path), "svchost.dll") ||
    regex(".*\\\\.{1}\\.dll", to_string($message.dll_path)).matches == true)
then
    set_field("potentially_malicious", "True");
end

rule "suspicious process parent names"
when
    has_field("process_parent") &&
    (contains(to_string($message.process_parent), "sp0olsv.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_parent), "spo0lsv.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_parent), "svchosts.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_parent), "svch0st.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_parent), "winsrv.exe") ||
    regex(".*\\\\.{1}\\.exe", to_string($message.process_parent)).matches == true)
then
    set_field("potentially_malicious", "True");
end

pipeline "Volatility"
stage 5 match either
rule "suspicious dll names"
rule "suspicious process names"
rule "suspicious process parent names"
stage 0 match either
rule "volatility stream"
rule "volatility getsids normalize"
rule "volatility pslist normalize"
rule "volatility dlllist normalize"
rule "volatility connscan normalize"
rule "volatility malfind normalize"
rule "volatility userassist normalize"
end

rule "suspicious process names"
when
    has_field("process_name") &&
    (contains(to_string($message.process_name), "sp0olsv.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_name), "spo0lsv.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_name), "svchosts.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_name), "svch0st.exe") ||
    contains(to_string($message.process_name), "winsrv.exe") ||
    regex(".*\\\\.{1}\\.exe", to_string($message.process_name)).matches == true)
then
    set_field("potentially_malicious", "True");
end

rule "volatility stream"
when
    from_input("5cd857e4b6b8ee07de4a3ee6")
then
    route_to_stream(id: "5cd85f1fb6b8ee07de4a46c2", remove_from_default: true);
end
